title: BizConnect
context: Your gateway to global business opportunities and partnerships

prelaunch.title: Expanding Your Business Network
prelaunch.body: BizConnect is our comprehensive business intelligence and networking platform designed to help you discover partnerships, conduct due diligence, and expand into new markets with confidence.

features.title: Business Matching Network
features.description: Access our extensive database of 1M+ verified businesses across Hong Kong, Mainland China, and overseas markets

features.title: Due Diligence Services
features.description: Comprehensive background checks and verification services for potential business partners

features.title: One-Stop Go Global Services
features.description: Everything you need to expand your business into international markets

features.title: China Market Entry Services
features.description: Specialized support for businesses looking to enter or expand in the Chinese market

features.title: Verified Business Network
features.description: Connect with confidence through our verified and authenticated business community

builtForYourSuccess.title: Built for Your Success
builtForYourSuccess.context: BizConnect combines cutting-edge technology with comprehensive business services

features.title: End-to-End Support
features.description: From initial research to partnership execution, we support you throughout your business expansion journey

features.title: Secure & Verified
features.description: All businesses in our network undergo rigorous verification to ensure authenticity and reliability

features.title: Global Reach
features.description: Access opportunities across multiple markets including Hong Kong, Mainland China, and international territories

stayInformed.title: Stay Informed
stayInformed.body: Be the first to know when BizConnect launches and get exclusive early access

developmentInProgress.title: Development in Progress
developmentInProgress.body: Our team is working diligently to bring you BizConnect with all its powerful features. We're currently in active development and expect to launch in the coming months. Thank you for your patience!
